announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 26th January, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Thursday borns and Christian Fathers' Association. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.

announcements.details: There will be a revival from 5th-7th February 2025 at 7pm each night right here at the church

announcements.details: There will be In His Presence next Sunday,26th January 2025 at 6pm. In attendance, will be Team Jesus.

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Marriage School will reopen early February, 2025. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2025 should please pick up registration forms from the office of the Rector.
